review: Glow by Natalia Barlow is an exceptional beauty and spa experience. Natalia's professionalism, attention to detail, and ability to make clients feel comfortable and confident are truly outstanding. The environment is warm and calming, enhancing the overall experience. Despite the business not accepting credit cards, the personalized service and high-quality results make it well worth the visit. I highly recommend Natalia for anyone looking for top-notch makeup and hair services.
